questions.question: How often do you recycle?

options.option: I recycle everything that can be recycled
I recycle most of the time, but sometimes I forget
I recycle sometimes, but could do better
I rarely recycle, but I am willing to learn more
I never recycle, but I am willing to start

questions.question: How often do you eat food that was grown locally?

options.option: I eat only locally sourced food
I eat locally sourced food most of the time, but sometimes buy imported products
I eat a mix of locally sourced and imported food
I rarely eat locally sourced food, but I am willing to make changes
I never eat locally sourced food, but I am willing to start

questions.question: Do you use energy-efficient light bulbs at home?

options.option: I have replaced all of my light bulbs with energy-efficient ones
I use energy-efficient light bulbs for most of my lights, but not all
I use a mix of energy-efficient and traditional light bulbs
I rarely use energy-efficient light bulbs, but I am willing to make changes
I never use energy-efficient light bulbs, but I am willing to start

questions.question: Do you use reusable bags when shopping?

options.option: I always bring my own reusable bags when shopping
I mostly use reusable bags, but sometimes forget or use plastic bags
I use both reusable and plastic bags equally
I rarely use reusable bags, but I am willing to make changes
I never use reusable bags, but I am willing to start

questions.question: How often do you buy organic produce?

options.option: I mostly buy organic produce, but sometimes buy conventionally-grown produce
I buy a mix of organic and conventionally-grown produce
I rarely buy organic produce, but I am willing to make changes
I never buy organic produce, but I am willing to start
